page.title: 15Religion: Rosneath
page.content: Christianity is religion publicly ack- nowledged.If others, not known.Protest ants in majority and worship at St. Modan's.Present building fifth in vic- inity of The Clachan.First,probably mud and wattle,dated 6-700AD.Princess Louise,daughter of Queen Victoria,don- ated mother's bible to church, reredos antique alms dish and much else.Price- less communion cups in regular use till 1984 now in Huntley House and Museum of Antiquities, Edinburgh. Rev. Malcolm Wright shared with congrega- tion of Craigrownie, Cove. Hoped to build church hall in vacant ground between church and Cedar View. Catholics worship at St.Gildas, new church built 1968 in modern style con- taining fine carvings. Catholic community growing as MOD personnel drafted to area and housed in Rosneath Canon Patrick Dineen.
